tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligenceReports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  report_description TEXT,
  report_author VARCHAR(100),
  report_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligenceReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  threat_level VARCHAR(50),
  report_summary TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ReportMetadata (
  metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  report_source VARCHAR(100),
  analyst_name VARCHAR(150),
  create_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES ThreatIntelligenceReports(report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE threat_reports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_title TEXT,
 report_content TEXT,
 report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE report_keywords (
 keyword_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 keyword TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE report_tags (
 tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 tag_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligenceReports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE,
    author TEXT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MalwareSamples (
    malware_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    hash_value TEXT,
    file_size INT,
    detected BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE IndicatorsOfCompromise (
    ioc_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ioc_type TEXT,
    ioc_value TEXT,
    severity INT,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ThreatIntelligenceReport (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    report_source VARCHAR(100)
);
